title: Keeping a champion
body: So, I'm a new player and Shyvana shows up as one of my champions. I really like using her, but it says i don't have her. Why is that?

replies.body: Hey new guy! Look me up if you ever want someone to show you the ropes.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Welcome to League!  New players have access to a specific set of champions up to level 5 to help with roles and a feel of mechanics.  After level 5, you will start going through the [weekly free champion rotation](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/free-rotation).  Anything else would need to be purchased with IP or RP.  I hope that helps!
